2164.subject: HCOM
2164.descrlong:
Often described as history from the bottom up, social history has become critical to how many historians have approached the history of ordinary people.  This course introduces students to commonly used theories, methods and practices in social history scholarship and historical writing with a primary emphasis on the history of the United States.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Prereq: GE Area A1 and A2 and A3)
